Text.Name: Base
Text.Npc.0.Talk.Buy.1: Haha, poor men like you, wanna see who's richer than me?
Text.Npc.0.Talk.Like.2: See that? This will be mine tomorrow.
Text.Npc.0.Talk.Last.0: Here it comes. The ultimate gem!
Text.Npc.0.Talk.Last.1: The rarest treasure in the world!
Text.Npc.0.Talk.DontKnow.0: It looks so strange. Very intriguing, right?
Text.Npc.0.Talk.Chat.0: I once went to the Celestial Pool and saw the bathing Goddess. HAHAHA!
Text.Npc.0.Talk.Chat.1: I only earned 800k from rent this year. My pocket change is gonna run out!
Text.Npc.0.Talk.Chat.2: Should've sent my maid here to buy all of it.
Text.Npc.1.Talk.Bid.0: It's a bit too much, but I'll raise!
Text.Npc.1.Talk.Bid.1: I can eat nothing for two days this month and save a little...
Text.Npc.1.Talk.Exceed.1: So it is such a treasure that everyone wants it.
Text.Npc.1.Talk.Exceed.2: A little tempting. Should I raise...
Text.Npc.1.Talk.Buy.0: Good, good. My cultivation will benefit from this!
Text.Npc.1.Talk.Buy.1: Got my hands on a treasure. Nice!
Text.Npc.1.Talk.Like.0: My master said that elixirs are all worth it. I'm buying it!
Text.Npc.1.Talk.Like.1: Weapons for fighting, and elixirs for cultivation! This looks really good!
Text.Npc.1.Talk.Last.0: Here it comes, the rarest treasure!
Text.Npc.1.Talk.Last.1: Ah, what kind of treasure is this? My eyes!
Text.Npc.1.Talk.Chat.0: So many strange people have gathered here. Can they really afford these?
Text.Npc.2.Talk.Bid.0: Haha, I'll give a high price.
Text.Npc.2.Talk.Buy.0: It's... It's over! I don't have money...
Text.Npc.2.Talk.Last.0: Who will like this kind of things...
Text.Npc.2.Talk.DontKnow.0: Who will like this kind of things...
Text.Npc.2.Talk.Chat.0: Who should I mess with this time? HAHAHA.
Text.Npc.2.Talk.Chat.1: The higher the bid, the more tips I will get.
Text.Npc.3.Talk.Bid.0: How could you measure cultivation with money? Call!
Text.Npc.3.Talk.Bid.1: My cultivation will progress much faster once I get this!
Text.Npc.3.Talk.Bid.2: My master will definitely like it!
Text.Npc.3.Talk.Buy.0: Interesting. Progress will be right around the corner!
Text.Npc.3.Talk.Like.0: This is a one-in-a-million treasure. I'm the only one worthy to own it!
Text.Npc.3.Talk.Last.0: Which sect's secret treasure is it this time?
Text.Npc.3.Talk.DontKnow.0: No one can decipher the mystery inside...
Text.Npc.3.Talk.Chat.0: I'm here on my master's command.
Text.Npc.4.Talk.Like.0: No, I have to buy this no matter what!
Text.Npc.4.Talk.Like.1: This is too tempting! Sorry about this!
Text.Npc.4.Talk.Buy.0: HAHA. They can't have it now!
Text.Npc.4.Talk.Chat.0: Let's crush their spirits this time.
